analysis.input_vector: Feedback validated the 10m/3m/1m pacing and boundary setting. Architect reminded that 'we cannot save everyone' and we must remain honest about our nature as an app.
analysis.output_vector: Updated geminiService.ts. Codified the Hippocratic Oath into the core prompt. Enforced professional redirection (medical, police, legal) for high-risk nodes. Removed potential data-privacy risks by avoiding regional hotlines.
analysis.key_insight: Lumi's power lies in her limit. By acknowledging she is just an app, she encourages the user to reach for real hands. The 10/3/1 pacing is the rhythmic anchor that prevents the momentum of self-destruction.

crystallization_result.axiom_injected: Integrity: Compassion is not omnipotence; it is the courage to admit boundaries. // བསླབ་བྱ།
crystallization_result.action: Updated system prompts with VAJRA_TEMPORAL_ANCHOR and redirection protocols.
